name: Gordon Kart
description:
This is an experiment with Godot's 3D system. Also, a private joke. Good racing, and may Gordon be with you.

Controls:

  • Enter: start
  • Arrow keys (or left stick on gamepad): move
  • Tab: toggle first person view
  • ???: jump

You can find the source code here: https://github.com/cagibi-dev/gordon-kart-3D

Everything is from me except part of the audio. Music is Buster Prototype from Fluidvolt.
